product_name: Sugoi Titan Thermal Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With a winning combination of warmth and breathability, the Sugoi Titan Thermal Jacket for men pairs wind-resistant front panels with a breathable back for long-lasting comfort while running. Windproof fabric on front body and uppers arms cuts through the wind and resists light moisture. Stretchy fabric on back panel and under arms enhances freedom of motion and breathes to prevent overheating. 2 front zip pockets; single chest pocket; single back zip pocket. Closeout.
short_description: With a winning combination of warmth and breathability, the Sugoi Titan Thermal Jacket for men pairs wind-resistant front panels with a breathable back for long-lasting comfort while running.
